metadata.title: CVE-2020-28601 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsingfunctionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability existsin Nef_2/PM_io_parser.h PM_io_parser::read_vertex() Face_of[] OOB read. Anattacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgal-demo - 5.2-3
libcgal-ipelets - 5.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cgal package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2-3').
